movies.title: Joker
movies.description: In Gotham City, a struggling stand-up comedian, Arthur Fleck, is driven insane and becomes the Joker.
Bank heist movie centered around a newly-minted police officer who will need to put his skills to the test.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.description: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the planet Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

movies.title: Monster House
movies.description: Three teens discover that their neighbor's house is really a living, breathing monster.

movies.title: Dark
movies.description: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town, where the disappearance of two young children exposes the dark past of the town and four families.

movies.title: Halloween
movies.description: Laurie Strode comes to her final confrontation with Michael Myers, the masked figure who has haunted her since she narrowly escaped his killing spree on Halloween night four decades ago.

movies.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
movies.description: After returning to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, John Wick discovers that a large bounty has been put on his head, and he must fight to survive.

movies.title: Southland Tales
movies.description: During a three-day heat wave just before a huge 4th of July celebration, an action star stricken with amnesia meets a tenacious reporter who helps him uncover the truth behind his identity.
